ModMetaData.name: Big Little Mod Patch
ModMetaData.author: Daria40K
ModMetaData.description:
This patch applys multiable patches to allow furniture from other mods to link with each other.
Mods Patched: - Eccentric Tech - Core - GloomyFurniture - Ideology [Official DLC] - Mechalit Core v2 - Medical Supplements - Medieval Overhaul - More Furniture - Rim-Effect: Core - Rim-Effect: Asari and Reapers - Science Never Stops: Ambition of the Cosmic - Sparkling Worlds - Full Mod - UN-Furniture - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Medical Module - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Spacer Module
